Ecumenical Canadian Forces Support Unit Ottawa Chaplain Services ([http://www.cfsuo.forces.gc.ca/adm/cha-aum/cu-cn-
eng.asp])

*Canadian Forces Ottawa Chapel houses "Our Lady of the Airways" Our Lady of the
Airways Chapel and Elizabeth Park Protestant Congregation. These are the
ecumenical faith communities meeting in the Uplands Military chapel located
beside Ottawa's International Airport on the Canadian Forces Uplands Military
Base.( [http://wikimapia.org/#lat=45.334439&lon=-75.662026&z=15&l=0&m=a&v=2
See Wikimapia] for Map ) These worshiping communities are part of the
Canadian Forces Support Unit Ottawa Chaplain Services and has regular Roman
Catholic and Protestant services serving military members and their families in
the National Capital Region. As well, there is assistance for other
denominations.
